resources.string: JOIN A GAME \n IF YOU HAVE A ROOM NO.
Welcome join this Room!\n\nPlease ask the rest members to join this game by follow room PIN.

Failed!

The room is full!!

Please make sure the PIN-code is right or the creator input the right player number!

Failed!

The room is not exist!!

Please make sure the PIN-code is correct!
Please press the name to vote.
Some players have not joined the room!\n\nPlease refresh the list after all players join the room!
You have voted a spy!\n\nPlease wait a moment until all the players voted.

You have been voted!!

You are not allow to vote any more.

You can refresh the list to check newly game state.
Some players have not voted!\n\nPlease make sure all players voted!
At lest one player quit the game.\n\nPlease recreate the room.
